text: Ntankeka twebwe twarabesheye Imana, nitwasubira mumico n’imigenzo yanyu munyuma yaho Imana yamaze kuturokora nivyo vyose, kandi ntibizobaho kuri twebwe gusubira muri iyo mico n’imigenzo kiretse Imana yonyene ibishatse ariyo Muremyi wacu, ikikujwe n’ibintu vyose k’ubumenyi bwayo bwose, ku Mana niyo twizeye, Muremyi wacu nuducire urubanza rw’ukuri ruri hagati yacu hamwe n’abagenzi bacu, na wewe ni wewe mwiza mubaca manza b’ukuri
